element.name: Her Majesty's Boon
element.description: A gift from the once Queen of I'Cath, you know the spell Conjure Ammunition. While you hold the dream stone, you may cast this spell a number of times equal to your proficiency modifier, even if you’re not in the dream world or in a region connected to the dream world. This spell doesn’t count against the spells you know and is always prepared.
